equater_notification_channel
Equater
equater
Notifications that keep you up to date on your Equater account and activity
In rare cases when a transaction doesn’t succeed, funds may temporarily be stored by Equater as an Equater Balance.
Deleting your account is permanent and cannot be undone. Please be certain this is what you want.
Delete your Equater account and all associated data. You CANNOT undo this action and you CANNOT recover your account. Think carefully before you proceed.
Once set, your date of birth and SSN cannot be changed, but you can use this form to update your address.
Our identity provider could not verify your identity. Please update your information or contact %1$s or %2$s for assistance.
Pick a merchant like Netflix, tell us who you split it with, and we’ll handle settling up automatically when you’re charged.
Create a series of scheduled payments by specifying a start/end date, an interval, payers, and amounts.
Snap! This one isn\'t in our database. If we find it on Google Maps we can still split the bill. Give it a try!
Before you proceed, we need you to verify your email. Check your inbox (spam folder too!) or use this button to resend the confirmation email.
Equater is built for shared monthly expenses. Tell us how you split your expenses and we\'ll settle up for you.
Unable to link account. Close the app & try again or contact %1$s
%1$s has asked that you verify your login information again so that we can continue serving you.
Since you pay for %1$s with a credit card we also need a bank account (checking/savings) on file that we can use to deposit the money your friends send you.
